summary: Clean implementation of POST /pages/ API endpoint with all previous review issues addressed. The unused imports (Q, Value, Coalesce) have been removed as requested. The magic number 20 for admin role is kept for codebase consistency as justified. Ready to merge.

issues.description: Magic number 20 for admin role check
issues.suggestion: Consider using a named constant for clarity. However, this is consistent with existing codebase patterns (module.py:497, app/views/page/base.py:382, license/api/views/workspace.py:92, etc.), so acceptable as-is per developer's justification.

positives: All previous review issues addressed - unused imports (Q, Value, Coalesce) have been removed
Clean separation between PageCreateSerializer (input) and PageSerializer (output)
Proper validation including project page_view check before page creation
Good use of select_related/prefetch_related for query optimization
Follows established patterns for webhook activity tracking via model_activity.delay()
DELETE correctly enforces archived_at check before allowing deletion
Proper ownership checks: only owner can change access, only owner or admin can delete
Clean handling of parent-child relationships on deletion
